data.title: Visit – Grundy Foundation
data.meta_description: visit The Grundy Foundation is conveniently located at 680 Radcliffe Street, Bristol PA 19007.   To plan your visit, click a location below:  Grundy Foundation Office Visitors are accepted by appointment only during regular office hours.   Campus & Grounds Visitors are invited to relax and enjoy the panoramic views of the Delaware River from our rooftop terraces and riverfront park. Explore the gardens, walk the Bristol History Trail, or bring a picnic lunch. If the timing is right, you may catch a glimpse of the bald eagles that soar over Burlington Island and the Delaware River.   Margaret R. Grundy Memorial Museum Visit the Grundy Museum website to learn more about our collections and to find out how to schedule a tour.   Margaret R. Grundy Memorial LibraryVisit the Grundy Library website to find out more about this community library and its extensive collections.
data.text:
To plan your visit, click a location below:

Grundy Foundation Office

Visitors are accepted by appointment only during regular office hours.

Campus & Grounds

Visitors are invited to relax and enjoy the panoramic views of the Delaware River from our rooftop terraces and riverfront park. Explore the gardens, walk the Bristol History Trail, or bring a picnic lunch. If the timing is right, you may catch a glimpse of the bald eagles that soar over Burlington Island and the Delaware River.

Margaret R. Grundy Memorial Museum

Visit the Grundy Museum website to learn more about our collections and to find out how to schedule a tour.
